sourcesContent:
import "./sa.css" export default function Sa2() { return (

Happiness is a problem

  • As with being rich there is no value in suffering when it is done without purpose
  • Life itself is a form of suffering
  • Extroverts suffer because of their extrovertness (too many friends, can’t focus on themselves, too many lies to keep up)
  • Rich suffer because of their riches, poor suffer because of their poverty
  • People with family suffer because of their family, people without family suffer because of their family
  • Suffering is biologically useful it is nature’s preferred agent for inspiring change
  • Pain is the best teacher, so its not always useful to avoid pain and seek pleasure
  • Our brain don’t register much difference between physical and psychological pain
  • The emotional pain of rejection or failure teaches us how to avoid making the same mistakes in the future
  • Life is full of problems the solution of one is merely the creation of another
  • Happiness coming from solving problems. If you are avoiding all your problems or feel like you don’t have problems that you can’t solve, you will likewise make yourself miserable
  • True happiness comes when you enjoy having and solving problems
  • Nobody who is actually happy has to stand in front of the mirror and tell he is happy or tell others that he is happy
  • Emotion fails us for the simple reason that emotions never last
  • Whatever makes us happy today will never make us happy tomorrow
) }
